plot: Nolan and Irisa are rescued from their underground confinement by a mysterious force, just in time to discover that enemy forces are marching on the town.

Joshua and Irisa head out on a reconnaissance patrol to see just how many soldiers General Rahm Tak has under his command, Along the way the run into Pilar and baby Luke. Not surprisingly, Pilar tries to scam them but Nolan isn't so easily taken in. When he realizes that Rahm Tak has the capability to breach their stasis field, he decides to take action. Back in Defiance, Stahma and Datak receive orders from the Rahm Tak. Stahma gets friendly with the Omec, T'evgin.—garykmcd
